title: Casters [3] And Caster Covers [3], 1981-49-10-a/f
provenance: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. William M. Cahn, Jr. in memory of Rosalie S. and William M. Cahn
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. William M. Cahn, Jr. in memory of Rosalie S. and William M. Cahn
description: Set of three (3) castors; one large and two smaller; each of octagonal baluster form with molded foot, pear-shaped body and reeded grille; covers with molded edge, eight panels tapered toward baluster finial, and pierced in panels of alternating design of floral scrolls and rosettes; the panels linked by chased strapwork bonds pierced with dots; covers with bezel closures; each castor engraved mid-body with a coat-of-arms in with a scroll and foliate cartouche, and below a crest (unidentifiable).  Artist: Charles Adam (active ca. 1703-after ca. 1711)
